'''Radiant Spincrystal 89''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]].<!--to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].-->

It is located inside [[Jeht]]'s tent in the [[Tanit Camps]].
